AudioData.Text: Hello! Welcome to Bio Scape! Let's explore the flora and fauna together.

The Marbled Water Monitor Lizard is a member of the monitor family, which are a group of very large lizards with long heads and rough, tough skin. It is not dangerous enough to kill a human, but it can deliver a nasty bite that has a high likelihood of infection.
